Row.Text: Monuments provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. Ziggurats provide +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture.
纪念碑+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化。金字形神塔+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化
The word of a king is supreme. Let the clay tablet carry my words across the lands.
王的言语至高无上。让泥板将我的话语传遍大地。
Enmerkar, legendary king of Uruk, your wisdom in creating cuneiform writing shall echo through the ages. Guide your people with the power of recorded knowledge.
恩美卡，乌鲁克的传奇国王，您创造楔形文字的智慧将流传千古。愿您以记录知识的力量引领您的人民。
